trans-unit.target: Target the Target of Your Current Target (Assist Target)<tab>TARGET_TTOT
Set Targeting Mode to PC Only<tab>CIRCLE_ENEMY
Set Targeting Mode to Party Only<tab>CIRCLE_PARTY
Set Targeting Mode to Enemy Only<tab>CIRCLE_PC
Cycle through Alliance List (Nearest to Farthest)<tab>TARGET_ALLIANCE_NEXT_KEY
Cycle through Alliance List (Farthest to Nearest)<tab>TARGET_ALLIANCE_PREV_KEY
Cycle through Alliance List 1 (Nearest to Farthest)<tab>TARGET_ALLIANCE1_NEXT
Cycle through Alliance List 1 (Farthest to Nearest)<tab>TARGET_ALLIANCE1_PREV
Cycle through Alliance List 2 (Nearest to Farthest)<tab>TARGET_ALLIANCE2_NEXT
Cycle through Alliance List 2 (Farthest to Nearest)<tab>TARGET_ALLIANCE2_PREV
Temporarily Switch Chat Mode to Say<tab>CMD_SAY

Move Cursor up/Cycle up through Party List<tab>UP
Move Cursor down/Cycle down through Party List<tab>DOWN
<var 12 14 /var> <var 08 E4E94C01 ((BACK Button)) ((<var 08 E4E94F64 ((Touch Pad Button)) ((View Button)) /var>)) /var><tab>VIRTUAL_PAD_SELECT
